0P0000UR0F.F.manager_bio: Michael Longeard is the main fund manager of Ellipsis High Yield Fund, a position he has held since joining Ellipsis AM in 2013, and extends his responsibility for the management of Ellipsis Short Term Credit Fund, in which he has been involved since 2013.
